name: my-bootstrapped
description: a browser app that allows yargs use in an xterm-js terminal

scripts.note: echo "first build typescript; then build javascript, which will work off of typescript output; at any time, build css. to understand the goal of the build, see main.js. main.js imports the results of the build.
scripts.mon: yarn nodemon --exec "yarn ts-build && yarn css-build && yarn js-build" --watch ../../dist-browser --watch ./src --watch ./css --ext js,ts,mjs,ts,css  --ignore public
scripts.mon2: yarn nodemon --exec "yarn ts-build && yarn js-build" --watch ../../dist-browser --watch ./src --ext js,ts,mjs,ts --ignore public
